name: BEST WESTERN Woodbury Inn

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.text: I have been a business traveler for over 10 years and I have stayed in every type of hotel in that time. Best Western overall is not the most consistant brand but they ususally are clean and a good value. This Hotel was a pleasant suprise. Not only was it clean but the overall amenities and quality was beyond my expectation for a Best Western. One thing that always makes the diffrence is the service and they get a A+.

reviews.text: the front desk clerk couldn't speak english barely. the manager was speaking loudly and using profanity on his cell phone. then we went to the room. hair, small ants, and dim lighting awaited us. the property is on the highway and your room door is about 50 feet from the double yellow lines. my room smelled of smoke, even though is was marked otherwise, my bathroom had chipped paint, and when i phone the front desk, no one answers.. i walk downt here the clerk is on the phone with someone personal.

reviews.title: Little Treasure in a great location
reviews.text: I am a business man who travels 4 days out of the week. I recently got held up on Long Island and needed a hotel to stay at. I walked into the Best Western Wodbury Inn without a reservation. I was shocked to find so many free amenties including free high speed internet at there busines center. The room I satyed in was very clean although the furniture looked old. The service was very friendly and effiecient. I was in my room in under 5 minutes great place to stay on long Island.

reviews.title: Great service and price
reviews.text: stayed here a few yrs ago and again recently. it's not as good as i remembered. our room had a strong windex/mold odor emanating from everywhere (maybe AC/htr?) the room conditions were old, and the bathroom area is small. the price is actually a bit high considering this place is no more than 2 stars IMO.

I recently stayed at the Best Western Woodbury and would not recommend it to anyone who doesn't normally stay in a low-class hotel. This has everything associated with it that is typical of a cheap motel. When I arrived later in the evening to check in, there was no one at the desk to help me and I waited for some time. I finally got my key and went to my room. Yikes. I was in the executive level rooms and let me tell you, I would hate to see the other rooms. My room had very dirty carpeting - it felt oily and greasy and I felt like I couldn't walk around in bare feet. While using my computer, I saw a HUGE SPIDER crawling down the wall. I also saw a mosquito flying around but assumed there was only one. Either that one was really hungry or there were multiple - I woke up with 3 large bug bites. The linens were inexpensive and scratchy. There were no toiletries in the bathroom other than a bar of soap. The towels were small and thin.
reviews.title: Don't do it!!!!

likes.disliked: — dirty carpet, cheap EVERYTHING, multiple bugs in room

reviews.text: On the upside, the bathroom was very clean and the internet was free.
reviews.title: Wonderful for family affair

reviews.text: However, I would not stay here again. If you don't mind budget hotels, this one is probably average. If you aren't used to them, it's a rude awakening.
reviews.title: Decent Place to Stay
Good Value!!!
reviews.text: My family stayed here over a long weekend in June for a wedding in Syosset. Six of us, set up by the bride. It worked out great and was a good surprise. We all liked our rooms, breakfast was just what we needed, and we relaxed around the pool. Wedding was 15 minutes away--they took us by van--free--we didn't have a car.
Great service--even came back for us after the wedding. No hassle, glad we stayed there.

description: Escape to the BEST WESTERN Woodbury Inn. This Award-Winning hotel is ranked in the Top 20% of BEST WESTERN hotels in the United States based on Quality Assurance and is a recipient of the 2012 Trip advisor Award of Excellence!! One of North America's first "I Care Clean (SM)" hotels in the BEST WESTERN family, the Woodbury Inn offers a pristine, lodge-style experience in the heart of beautiful Long Island, NY.The hotel offers lunch and dinner which is made available through our delicious room service program. Sink into bed each night at this Long Island hotel and wake up to a complimentary deluxe continental breakfast offering HOT scrambled eggs with cheese, Belgian Waffles, freshly baked NY Bagels, yogurt muffins, bakery fresh Danish, Pastries, donuts and breads as well as cereals, oatmeal's, hot coffee, Tazo Teas, and an assortment of juices. Guests at the BEST WESTERN Woodbury Inn can unwind with an array of amenities including a beautiful outdoor pool and sundeck (seasonal) lined with lush gardens. The hotel offers a 24 hour business center, Fitness Center, and daily free shuttle service within five miles (based upon availability) to malls and restaurants as well as the Corp Offices of Geico, Cablevision, Arizona Iced Tea, Snapple, Southern Wine, Johnson Controls, Crossways Industrial Park and Cold Spring Harbor Laboratories.Hotel Guests delight in the fact that Nassau Coliseum, Jones Beach, Westbury Music Fair, Splish Splash Water park, the Gold Coast Mansions, Tanger Outlet Mall, Belmont Racetrack and the Long Island wineries are all near this Long Island hotel.The hotel is just footsteps to Catering Halls such as the Woodlands, Crest Hollow Country Club, Woodbury Country Club, the Fox Hollow, and Oheka Castle. This hotel is also the perfect place to stay while visiting students or faculty at CW Post University, Hofstra, Adelphi and SUNY Old Westbury. Make your reservation today and ensure a memorable experience with the BEST WESTERN Woodbury Inn!
